poems:
  - title: Spring Morning
    content: |
      Birds singing in the trees
      Flowers blooming in the breeze
      A perfect spring morning
    revision_date: 2024-04-05

# Friday, April 5, 2024

Wrote a poem this morning inspired by the beautiful spring weather.
